column1: The Pit Room////Can't leave out the pulled pork and the sausages. I've never ordered pulled pork at a bbq place before
column2: but this I'd actually order as a sandwich. Among the sausages
column3: the jalape√±o cheddar was my favorite but I enjoyed all of them. Little more tightly packed than Killen's
